description: Try our easy to follow Baked Tuna Rosti recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury fritter,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Potato,Broccolini,Fish,Microwave,Wheat free,Asparagus,Peanut free
name: Baked Tuna Rosti Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch broccolini, cut into short lengths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Coarsely grate potatoes and place into a microwave-safe bowl. Cover and cook on high for 3 minutes or until just soft. Stir with a fork to loosen and transfer to a large bowl.
Grate onion and squeeze out excess moisture. Add to potato with tuna, grated rind of 1 lemon, parsley, feta and egg. Season with salt and pepper and mix well to combine.

Using 1/4 cup of mixture for each, shape into patties. Spray both sides with oil and place on a baking paper-lined oven tray. Bake for around 20 minutes, turning halfway through cooking time, until golden and crisp.
Meanwhile, blanch asparagus and broccolini in boiling water for 1 minute, drain. Drizzle with oil and season with salt and pepper. Cut remaining lemon into wedges and serve with rosti and vegetables.
